channel.title: Yoma Insights
channel.description: Latest general news and updates from Yoma

item.title: Expanding Opportunities Across Africa
item.description:
We’re thrilled to announce the expansion of Yoma’s digital platform across multiple African regions. This move will enable more youth to connect with verified opportunities and rewards programs.

What’s new:

  • Localized campaigns per country
  • Reward tracking and mobile integration
  • Improved accessibility for low-bandwidth users

item.title: New Reward Features Launching Soon
item.description: We’re introducing new reward types, including Achievement Badges and Referral Bonuses. Stay tuned for full details in the next app update.

item.title: Partner Spotlight: Collaboration with UNICEF
item.description:
Yoma continues its partnership with UNICEF to empower youth through accessible digital learning and verified skill-building programs across Africa.

Read how this collaboration is shaping the next generation of changemakers.

item.title: Community Success Story: A Youth Entrepreneur’s Journey
item.description:
Meet Lindiwe, a Yoma community member who turned her passion for design into a thriving business using the Yoma platform and its learning pathways.

Discover her inspiring story and tips for success.

item.title: Platform Update: Performance and Accessibility Improvements
item.description:
We’ve rolled out key performance upgrades across the Yoma platform, improving load times and accessibility for users on all devices.

Faster, smoother, and more inclusive — the new Yoma experience is here.
